Source.SQL: SELECT gy.fuwujgmc, u.recordreportunitcode, u.childbookid, u.homeaddresstext, u.dadname, u.momname, u.childname, u.homeaddresstext, u.childsex, u.birthday, CASE WHEN u.birthweight IS NOT NULL THEN u.birthweight WHEN cg.birthWeight IS NOT NULL THEN cg.birthweight ELSE null END as birthweight, cg.gestation, cg.accoucheunitname, u.deathdate, u.deathage FROM underfiveyearsdeathcase u LEFT JOIN cc_generalinfo cg ON cg.childbookid = u.childbookid LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG gy ON u.recordreportunitcode = gy.FUWUJGBH and gy.HZStatisticsType = 1 WHERE u.status = 4 and CONVERT(varchar(100), deathdate, 23) >= @checkDayStart and CONVERT(varchar(100), deathdate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@checkDayEnd) and gy.fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc and gy.dizhibm = @dizhibm and gy.fuwujgbh = @organization ORDER BY gy.FUWUJGBH DESC @Pager
